name: Keyboard Warrior (itch) (BrandonDefault)
description:
Keyboard Warrior is a GameJam project created by:

Brandon Miller - Design Lead

Dylan Clarke - Art Lead

Lochie Perry-Scott - Programming Lead

Jay Miller - Sound Design, QA Testing and Additional Programming

Joseph Cwiek - QA Testing and Additional Programming

This experience was made in just  under 48 hours on campus at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment. The theme for the gamejam was 'Nature and Technology'.

The team thought it would be good fun to create a wave shooter where you used lines of code as ammo against the antagonising robots - who are approaching fast to destroy the heart of nature!
